DOC.brief_summary: This cross-sectional study aim validate effectiveness combine use Osteoporosis Self-Assessment Tool Asians ( OSTA ) One-Minute Osteoporosis Risk Test ( IOF test ) population Wuhan , China .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Value Self-assessment Risk Osteoporosis Chinese
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-sectional study field investigation . A total 400 Wuhan resident visit Health Examination Department hospital invite participate study . Potential participant inform aim procedure ask sign inform consent form participation . Inclusion criterion follow : age least 20 year , able read fill questionnaire , willingness participate . Exclusion criterion follow : severe liver , heart , kidney impairment , tumor . Procedures study accordance Declaration Helsinki approve local ethic committee . The study population divide four group accord age sex : Younger Women ( age ≤ 55 year ) , Younger Men ( age ≤ 55 year ) , Older Women ( age > 55 year ) , Older Men ( age > 55 year ) . A research assistant nurse distribute Chinese version IOF test participant . The Chinese version IOF test include 10 question , two specific woman one men . The maximum number risk factor 8 woman 9 men . Individuals regard susceptible osteoporosis risk answer `` yes '' 10 question . To assess grade osteoporosis risk , OSTA index calculate equation ( body weight ( kg ) - age ( year ) ) *0.2 . An OSTA index -1 -4 regard medium risk , great -1 low risk , less -4 high risk .
